name: Hectic
description: Hectic is an arcade First Person Shooter that throws the player back into the roots of the classic FPS genre, featuring a huge arsenal of weapons and many enemies to destroy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Mostly any graphics cards should work DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 150 MB available space
